name: Dengo Systems
description:
Our main areas of work are web development of any type, development of mobile applications, creation of individual design and corporate identity for the company, fixing extremely urgent projects, as well as assisting in any matter. Our expertise allows us to connect to an existing project at any stage and solve non-standard tasks.
We are experts in: 
Java, PHP, JavaScript, JQuery, Ajax, AngularJS, Python, C ++, JSP, HTML, CSS, MySQL, Wordpress, Joomla, Shopify, Bigcommerce, etc. 
Zend, CodeIgniter, Kohana, Yii frameworks. 
Payment integrations: PayPal, Authorize.NET, 2Checkout.
Integrations via API, JSON: Facebook, Twitter, Amazon, Google Maps etc.
